name: Dedalirium
description:
Dedalirium is a puzzle game in first person. Rotate the gravity to explore and access new places, and solve puzzles to find the Dedalirium secrets.

This version includes the first tutorial only. 

Notes : 

- There is no ending. 
- Walking on some spots in the hub (after you completed the tutorial) will reset the game
- There is a secondary path you have to find, to experiment with the gravity switch in an open area.  Falling too far from the world will also reset the game
